original_title: Girl with a Pearl Earring: And Other Treasures from the Mauritshuis
overview: The Girl with a Pearl Earring' by Johannes Vermeer is one of the most enduring paintings in the history of art. This beautifully filmed documentary goes in pursuit of answers to the unresolved riddles surrounding this extraordinary piece.
title: Girl with a Pearl Earring: And Other Treasures from the Mauritshuis
